document_name: Law No 810-ІХ amending certain laws on Improving the Conditions of Support for Electricity Production from Alternative Energy Sources
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/UKR/2020/UKR-2020-07-31-Law No 810-ІХ amending certain laws on Improving the Conditions of Support for Electricity Production from Alternative Energy Sources_7df6cc51af468d35ac6694f254bd546d.pdf
document_description: This law provides state guarantees to foreign investments into renewables, sets new rates for green tariffs and introduces dedicated auctions.
